original_text: And from among the priests:the descendants ofHobaiah, Hakkoz and Barzillai (a man who had married a daughter of Barzillai the Gileadite and was called by that name).
korean_text: 제사장 중에는 호바야 자손과 학고스 자손과 바르실래 자손이니 바르실래는 길르앗 사람 바르실래의 딸 중의 하나로 아내를 삼고 바르실래의 이름으로 불린 자라

sentences.original_text: the descendants of Hobaiah, Hakkoz and Barzillai
a man who had married a daughter of Barzillai the Gileadite
sentences.korean_translation: 길르앗 사람 바르실래의 딸과 결혼한 한 사람

sentences.original_text: and was called by that name.
